pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw: I think that my comment about the status bar looking weird is in part due to the fact that it is white on my system, whereas on yours it's the same background colour, so it doesn't look like the box above is sitting in front of the status bar.
content.html: I think that my comment about the status bar looking weird is in part due to the fact that it is white on my system, whereas on yours it's the same background colour, so it doesn't look like the box above is sitting in front of the status bar.
